About Me

Here, let me tell you a few things about me

BIO

Meet Tasos, an experienced aircraft planner with a passion for web development. With over 3 years of experience in aviation, Tasos has worked for the Hellenic Aerospace Industry to plan, schedule, and maintain aircraft operations. Despite his success in the aviation industry, Tasos has always been interested in web development and has taught himself various coding languages and web development frameworks in his free time. He has built several websites for friends and family and has completed online courses to refine his skills. Now, Tasos is ready to combine his two passions and pursue a career in web development. He is eager to apply his problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and technical expertise to create engaging and functional websites for businesses and individuals. Tasos is proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and has experience working with popular frameworks such as Express and React. He is a quick learner and is constantly expanding his knowledge of programming languages and web development tools. If you're looking for a skilled web developer who is also a seasoned aircraft planner with an eye for detail, Tasos could be the perfect fit for your team. Contact him today to learn more about his experience and qualifications.

Main Work

Planning and Database Maintenance

As an Aircraft Planner, I am responsible for coordinating and managing the scheduling and routing of aircrafts in accordance with company policies, regulations, and customer requirements. I ensure that all aircrafts are maintained and / or upgraded to meet safety standards, coordinate with other departments to optimize resources, and oversee flight plans to minimize disruptions and delays. I also analyze data and provide reports to management to improve operational efficiency and customer satisfaction. This role requires excellent communication, analytical, and problem-solving skills, which i utilize to ensure the smooth operation of aircraft schedules and maximize customer satisfaction.

Freelancing

Full Stack Developer

As a solo web developer, I designed and developed multiple responsive websites using a variety of front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I also gained experience in using different frameworks like Express and React to build complex applications. Additionally, I learned how to deploy websites using cloud services like AWS and Azure. Throughout my solo experience, I had the opportunity to refine my problem-solving skills and become more proficient in debugging and testing my own code.

Side Project

E-commerce

As a solo developer, I created an ecommerce website using a combination of front-end technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, as well as back-end technologies such as Node.js and MongoDB. I integrated payment gateways like Stripe and PayPal and implemented features such as user authentication, product management, and order tracking. Throughout the project, I focused on creating a seamless user experience, optimizing the site's performance, and ensuring that it was secure and scalable.
